00043 // external utilities
00044 
00045 #define SET_ERR(d) SyncSetDecodeErr(d, -__LINE__)
00046 extern void
00047 SyncNoteErr(const char *msg) {
00048     char *s = getenv("CCNS_NOTE_ERR");
00049     int useStdErr = 0;
00050     if (s != NULL && s[0] != 0)
00051         useStdErr = strtol(s, NULL, 10);
00052     if (useStdErr > 0) {
00053         fprintf(stderr, "**** error in %s\n", msg);
00054         fflush(stderr);
00055     }
00056 }
00057 
00058 extern int
00059 SyncSetDecodeErr(struct ccn_buf_decoder *d, int val) {
00060     SyncNoteErr("setErr");
00061     if (d->decoder.state >= 0) d->decoder.state = val;
00062     return val;
00063 }
00064 
00065 extern int
00066 SyncCheckDecodeErr(struct ccn_buf_decoder *d) {
00067     return d->decoder.state < 0;
00068 }
00069 
00070 extern int64_t
00071 SyncCurrentTime(void) {
00072     const int64_t M = 1000*1000;
00073     struct timeval now = {0};
00074     gettimeofday(&now, 0);
00075     return now.tv_sec*M+now.tv_usec;
00076 }
00077 
00078 extern int64_t
00079 SyncDeltaTime(int64_t mt1, int64_t mt2) {
00080     return mt2-mt1;
00081 }
00082 
00083 extern struct ccn_buf_decoder *
00084 SyncInitDecoderFromCharbufRange(struct ccn_buf_decoder *d,
00085                                 const struct ccn_charbuf *cb,
00086                                 ssize_t start, ssize_t stop) {
00087     if (((size_t) stop) >  cb->length) stop = cb->length;
00088     if (start < 0 || start > stop) {
00089         SET_ERR(d); // invalid
00090     } else {
00091         ccn_buf_decoder_start(d, cb->buf+start, stop - start);
00092     }
00093     d->decoder.nest = 1;
00094     return d;
00095 }
00096 
00097 extern struct ccn_buf_decoder *
00098 SyncInitDecoderFromCharbuf(struct ccn_buf_decoder *d,
00099                            const struct ccn_charbuf *cb,
00100                            ssize_t start) {
00101     return SyncInitDecoderFromCharbufRange(d, cb, start, cb->length);
00102 }
00103 
00104 extern int
00105 SyncDecodeHexDigit(char c) {
00106     if (c >= '0' && c <= '9') return c - '0';
00107     if (c >= 'a' && c <= 'f') return 10 + c - 'a';
00108     if (c >= 'A' && c <= 'F') return 10 + c - 'A';
00109     return -1;
00110 }
00111 
00112 extern int
00113 SyncDecodeUriChar(char c) {
00114     if ((c >= 'A' && c <= 'Z') || (c >= 'a' && c <= 'z')
00115         || (c >= '0' && c <= '9')
00116         || c == '/' || c == '%' || c == ':'
00117         || c == '.' || c == '-' || c == '_' || c == '~') {
00118         // valid character
00119         return c;
00120     }
00121     return -1;
00122 }
00123 
00124 extern char *
00125 SyncHexStr(const unsigned char *cp, size_t sz) {
00126     char *hex = NEW_ANY(sz*2+1, char);
00127     char *hexLit = "0123456789abcdef";
00128     int i = 0;
00129     for (i = 0; i < sz; i++) {
00130         hex[i+i] = hexLit[(cp[i] / 16) & 15];
00131         hex[i+i+1] = hexLit[cp[i] & 15];
00132     }
00133     return hex;
00134 }

00140 extern int
00141 SyncNoteFailed(struct SyncRootStruct *root, char *where, char *why, int line) {
00142     if (root->base->debug >= CCNL_SEVERE)
00143         sync_msg(root->base, "%s, root#%u, failed, %s, line %d",
00144                  where, root->rootId, why, line);
00145     SyncNoteErr("Sync.SyncNoteFailed");
00146     return -line;
00147 }

00184 extern int
00185 SyncCmpNamesInner(struct ccn_buf_decoder *xx, struct ccn_buf_decoder *yy) {
00186     // adapted from ccn_compare_names
00187     if (ccn_buf_match_dtag(xx, CCN_DTAG_Name))
00188         ccn_buf_advance(xx);
00189     else SET_ERR(xx);
00190     if (ccn_buf_match_dtag(yy, CCN_DTAG_Name))
00191         ccn_buf_advance(yy);
00192     else SET_ERR(yy);
00193     ssize_t cmp = 0;
00194     while (SyncCheckDecodeErr(xx) == 0 && SyncCheckDecodeErr(yy) == 0) {
00195         int more_x = ccn_buf_match_dtag(xx, CCN_DTAG_Component);
00196         int more_y = ccn_buf_match_dtag(yy, CCN_DTAG_Component);
00197         cmp = more_x - more_y;
00198         if (more_x == 0 || cmp != 0)
00199             break;
00200         ccn_buf_advance(xx);
00201         ccn_buf_advance(yy);
00202         size_t xs = 0;
00203         size_t ys = 0;
00204         const unsigned char *xp = NULL;
00205         const unsigned char *yp = NULL;
00206         if (ccn_buf_match_blob(xx, &xp, &xs)) ccn_buf_advance(xx);
00207         if (ccn_buf_match_blob(yy, &yp, &ys)) ccn_buf_advance(yy);
00208         cmp = xs - ys;
00209         if (cmp != 0)
00210             break;
00211         if (xs != 0) {
00212             cmp = memcmp(xp, yp, xs);
00213             if (cmp != 0)
00214                 break;
00215         }
00216         ccn_buf_check_close(xx);
00217         ccn_buf_check_close(yy);
00218     }
00219     ccn_buf_check_close(xx);
00220     ccn_buf_check_close(yy);
00221     if (cmp > 0) return 1;
00222     if (cmp < 0) return -1;
00223     return 0;
00224 }
00225 
00226 extern int
00227 SyncCmpNames(const struct ccn_charbuf *cbx, const struct ccn_charbuf *cby) {
00228     struct ccn_buf_decoder xds;
00229     struct ccn_buf_decoder *xx = SyncInitDecoderFromCharbuf(&xds, cbx, 0);
00230     struct ccn_buf_decoder yds;
00231     struct ccn_buf_decoder *yy = SyncInitDecoderFromCharbuf(&yds, cby, 0);
00232     int cmp = SyncCmpNamesInner(xx, yy);
00233     if (SyncCheckDecodeErr(xx) || SyncCheckDecodeErr(yy)) return SYNC_BAD_CMP;
00234     return (cmp);
00235 }
00236 
00237 // tests to see if the offset refers to a name
00238 // no errors
00239 extern int
00240 SyncIsName(const struct ccn_charbuf *cb) {
00241     struct ccn_buf_decoder xds;
00242     struct ccn_buf_decoder *d = SyncInitDecoderFromCharbuf(&xds, cb, 0);
00243     if (!SyncCheckDecodeErr(d) && ccn_buf_match_dtag(d, CCN_DTAG_Name))
00244         return 1;
00245     return 0;
00246 }
00247 
00248 extern int
00249 SyncComponentCount(const struct ccn_charbuf *name) {
00250     struct ccn_buf_decoder ds;
00251     struct ccn_buf_decoder *d = SyncInitDecoderFromCharbuf(&ds, name, 0);
00252     int count = 0;
00253     if (ccn_buf_match_dtag(d, CCN_DTAG_Name)) {
00254         ccn_buf_advance(d);
00255         while (ccn_buf_match_dtag(d, CCN_DTAG_Component)) {
00256             const unsigned char *cPtr = NULL;
00257             size_t cSize = 0;
00258             ccn_buf_advance(d);
00259             if (ccn_buf_match_blob(d, &cPtr, &cSize)) ccn_buf_advance(d);
00260             ccn_buf_check_close(d);
00261             count++;
00262         }
00263         ccn_buf_check_close(d);
00264         if (!SyncCheckDecodeErr(d))
00265             return count;
00266     }
00267     return -1;
00268 }
00269 
00270 extern int
00271 SyncPatternMatch(const struct ccn_charbuf *pattern,
00272                  const struct ccn_charbuf *name,
00273                  int start) {
00274     struct ccn_buf_decoder xds;
00275     struct ccn_buf_decoder *xx = SyncInitDecoderFromCharbuf(&xds, pattern, 0);
00276     struct ccn_buf_decoder yds;
00277     struct ccn_buf_decoder *yy = SyncInitDecoderFromCharbuf(&yds, name, 0);
00278     if (!ccn_buf_match_dtag(xx, CCN_DTAG_Name)) return -1;
00279     ccn_buf_advance(xx);
00280     if (!ccn_buf_match_dtag(yy, CCN_DTAG_Name)) return -1;
00281     ccn_buf_advance(yy);
00282     int match = 0;
00283     int index = 0;
00284     while (index < start) {
00285         // skip initial components of name
00286         if (!ccn_buf_match_dtag(yy, CCN_DTAG_Component))
00287             return -1;
00288         ccn_buf_advance(yy);
00289         if (!ccn_buf_match_blob(yy, NULL, NULL))
00290             return -1;
00291         ccn_buf_advance(yy);
00292         ccn_buf_check_close(yy);
00293         index++;
00294     }
00295     while (SyncCheckDecodeErr(xx) == 0 && SyncCheckDecodeErr(yy) == 0) {
00296         int more_x = ccn_buf_match_dtag(xx, CCN_DTAG_Component);
00297         int more_y = ccn_buf_match_dtag(yy, CCN_DTAG_Component);
00298         if (more_x == 0) {
00299             // end of pattern
00300             ccn_buf_check_close(xx);
00301             if (!SyncCheckDecodeErr(xx))
00302                 return match;
00303             return -1;
00304         }
00305         if (more_y == 0) {
00306             // end of name
00307             ccn_buf_check_close(yy);
00308             if (!SyncCheckDecodeErr(yy))
00309                 return 0;
00310             return -1;
00311         }
00312         ccn_buf_advance(xx);
00313         ccn_buf_advance(yy);
00314         size_t xs = 0;
00315         size_t ys = 0;
00316         const unsigned char *xp = NULL;
00317         const unsigned char *yp = NULL;
00318         if (ccn_buf_match_blob(xx, &xp, &xs)) ccn_buf_advance(xx);
00319         if (ccn_buf_match_blob(yy, &yp, &ys)) ccn_buf_advance(yy);
00320         int star = 0;
00321         if (xs > 0 && (xp[0] == 255)) {
00322             // a component starting with FF may be a star-matcher
00323             // if not a single byte, swallow the FF
00324             xs--;
00325             xp++;
00326             if (xs == 0) star = 1;
00327         }
00328         if (star) {
00329             // star-matching
00330         } else if (xs != ys) {
00331             // name lengths differ
00332             return 0;
00333         } else {
00334             // equal sizes, check contents
00335             ssize_t cmp = memcmp(xp, yp, xs);
00336             if (cmp != 0) return 0;
00337         }
00338         match++;
00339         ccn_buf_check_close(xx);
00340         ccn_buf_check_close(yy);
00341     }
00342     return (-1);
00343 }
00344 
00345 extern int
00346 SyncPrefixMatch(const struct ccn_charbuf *prefix,
00347                 const struct ccn_charbuf *name,
00348                 int start) {
00349     struct ccn_buf_decoder xds;
00350     struct ccn_buf_decoder *xx = SyncInitDecoderFromCharbuf(&xds, prefix, 0);
00351     struct ccn_buf_decoder yds;
00352     struct ccn_buf_decoder *yy = SyncInitDecoderFromCharbuf(&yds, name, 0);
00353     if (!ccn_buf_match_dtag(xx, CCN_DTAG_Name)) return -1;
00354     ccn_buf_advance(xx);
00355     if (!ccn_buf_match_dtag(yy, CCN_DTAG_Name)) return -1;
00356     ccn_buf_advance(yy);
00357     int match = 0;
00358     int index = 0;
00359     while (index < start) {
00360         // skip initial components of name
00361         if (!ccn_buf_match_dtag(yy, CCN_DTAG_Component)) break;
00362         ccn_buf_advance(yy);
00363         if (ccn_buf_match_blob(yy, NULL, NULL)) ccn_buf_advance(yy);
00364         index++;
00365     }
00366     while (SyncCheckDecodeErr(xx) == 0 && SyncCheckDecodeErr(yy) == 0) {
00367         int more_x = ccn_buf_match_dtag(xx, CCN_DTAG_Component);
00368         int more_y = ccn_buf_match_dtag(yy, CCN_DTAG_Component);
00369         if (more_x == 0) {
00370             // end of prefix
00371             ccn_buf_check_close(xx);
00372             if (!SyncCheckDecodeErr(xx))
00373                 return match;
00374             return -1;
00375         }
00376         if (more_y == 0) {
00377             // end of name
00378             ccn_buf_check_close(yy);
00379             if (!SyncCheckDecodeErr(yy))
00380                 return 0;
00381             return -1;
00382         }
00383         ccn_buf_advance(xx);
00384         ccn_buf_advance(yy);
00385         size_t xs = 0;
00386         size_t ys = 0;
00387         const unsigned char *xp = NULL;
00388         const unsigned char *yp = NULL;
00389         if (ccn_buf_match_blob(xx, &xp, &xs)) ccn_buf_advance(xx);
00390         if (ccn_buf_match_blob(yy, &yp, &ys)) ccn_buf_advance(yy);
00391         if (xs != ys) {
00392             // name lengths differ
00393             return 0;
00394         } else if (xs > 0) {
00395             // equal sizes, check contents
00396             ssize_t cmp = memcmp(xp, yp, xs);
00397             if (cmp != 0) return 0;
00398         }
00399         match++;
00400         ccn_buf_check_close(xx);
00401         ccn_buf_check_close(yy);
00402     }
00403     return -1;
00404 }
00405 
00406 extern int
00407 SyncComponentMatch(const struct ccn_charbuf *x,
00408                    const struct ccn_charbuf *y) {
00409     struct ccn_buf_decoder xds;
00410     struct ccn_buf_decoder *xx = SyncInitDecoderFromCharbuf(&xds, x, 0);
00411     struct ccn_buf_decoder yds;
00412     struct ccn_buf_decoder *yy = SyncInitDecoderFromCharbuf(&yds, y, 0);
00413     if (!ccn_buf_match_dtag(xx, CCN_DTAG_Name)) return -1;
00414     ccn_buf_advance(xx);
00415     if (!ccn_buf_match_dtag(yy, CCN_DTAG_Name)) return -1;
00416     ccn_buf_advance(yy);
00417     int match = 0;
00418     size_t xs = 0;
00419     size_t ys = 0;
00420     const unsigned char *xp = NULL;
00421     const unsigned char *yp = NULL;
00422     for (;;) {
00423         if (!ccn_buf_match_dtag(xx, CCN_DTAG_Component)) break;
00424         if (!ccn_buf_match_dtag(yy, CCN_DTAG_Component)) break;
00425         ccn_buf_advance(xx);
00426         ccn_buf_advance(yy);
00427         if (!ccn_buf_match_blob(xx, &xp, &xs)) return -1;
00428         if (!ccn_buf_match_blob(yy, &yp, &ys)) return -1;
00429         if (xs != ys) break;
00430         ssize_t cmp = memcmp(xp, yp, xs);
00431         if (cmp != 0) break;
00432         ccn_buf_advance(xx);
00433         ccn_buf_advance(yy);
00434         ccn_buf_check_close(xx);
00435         ccn_buf_check_close(yy);
00436         match++;
00437     }
00438     if (SyncCheckDecodeErr(xx)) match = -1;
00439     if (SyncCheckDecodeErr(yy)) match = -1;
00440     return match;
00441 }
00442 
00443 extern int
00444 SyncGetComponentPtr(const struct ccn_charbuf *src, int comp,
00445                     const unsigned char **xp, ssize_t *xs) {
00446     struct ccn_buf_decoder sbd;
00447     struct ccn_buf_decoder *s = SyncInitDecoderFromCharbuf(&sbd, src, 0);
00448     if (ccn_buf_match_dtag(s, CCN_DTAG_Name) && (xp != NULL) && (xs != NULL)) {
00449         int pos = 0;
00450         ccn_buf_advance(s);
00451         while (pos <= comp) {
00452             if (!ccn_buf_match_dtag(s, CCN_DTAG_Component)) break;
00453             ccn_buf_advance(s);
00454             if (!ccn_buf_match_blob(s, xp, (size_t *) xs)) break;
00455             ccn_buf_advance(s);
00456             ccn_buf_check_close(s);
00457             if (SyncCheckDecodeErr(s)) break;
00458             if (pos == comp)
00459                 // found the component
00460                 return 0;
00461             pos++;
00462         }
00463     }
00464     return -1;
00465 }
00466 
00467 extern int
00468 SyncAppendAllComponents(struct ccn_charbuf *dst,
00469                         const struct ccn_charbuf *src) {
00470     struct ccn_buf_decoder sbd;
00471     struct ccn_buf_decoder *s = SyncInitDecoderFromCharbuf(&sbd, src, 0);
00472     int count = 0;
00473     int pos = 0;
00474     if (!ccn_buf_match_dtag(s, CCN_DTAG_Name))
00475         // src is not a name
00476         return -__LINE__;
00477     ccn_buf_advance(s);
00478     for (;;) {
00479         if (!ccn_buf_match_dtag(s, CCN_DTAG_Component)) break;
00480         ccn_buf_advance(s);
00481         const unsigned char *cPtr = NULL;
00482         size_t cSize = 0;
00483         if (ccn_buf_match_blob(s, &cPtr, &cSize)) ccn_buf_advance(s);
00484         if (ccn_name_append(dst, cPtr, cSize) < 0)
00485             return -__LINE__;
00486         count++;
00487         ccn_buf_check_close(s);
00488         if (SyncCheckDecodeErr(s)) return -__LINE__;
00489         pos++;
00490     }
00491     ccn_buf_check_close(s);
00492     if (SyncCheckDecodeErr(s)) return -__LINE__;
00493     return count;
00494 }
00495 
00496 extern struct ccn_charbuf *
00497 SyncNameForIndexbuf(const unsigned char *buf, struct ccn_indexbuf *comps) {
00498     struct ccn_charbuf *name = ccn_charbuf_create();
00499     ccn_name_init(name);
00500     int i = 0;
00501     int nComp = comps->n-1;
00502     int res = 0;
00503     for (i = 0; i < nComp; i++) {
00504         const unsigned char *cp = NULL;
00505         size_t sz = 0;
00506         res |= ccn_name_comp_get(buf, comps, i, &cp, &sz);
00507         if (res < 0) break;
00508         res |= ccn_name_append(name, cp, sz);
00509         if (res < 0) break;
00510     }
00511     if (res < 0) {
00512         SyncNoteErr("SyncNameForIndexbuf failed");
00513         ccn_charbuf_destroy(&name);
00514         return NULL;
00515     }
00516     return name;
00517 }
00518 
00519 extern struct ccn_charbuf *
00520 SyncUriForName(struct ccn_charbuf *name) {
00521     struct ccn_charbuf *ret = ccn_charbuf_create();
00522     if (name == NULL)
00523         ccn_charbuf_append_string(ret, "(null)");
00524     else ccn_uri_append(ret, name->buf, name->length, 0);
00525     return ret;
00526 }
00527 
00528 extern struct ccn_charbuf *
00529 SyncConstructCommandPrefix(struct SyncRootStruct *root, char *marker) {
00530     struct ccn_charbuf *prefix = ccn_charbuf_create();
00531     int res = 0;
00532     ccn_name_init(prefix);
00533     if (root->topoPrefix != NULL && root->topoPrefix->length > 0) {
00534         // the topo (if any) always comes first
00535         res |= SyncAppendAllComponents(prefix, root->topoPrefix);
00536     }
00537     // the command comes after the topo
00538     ccn_name_append_str(prefix, marker);
00539     res |= ccn_name_append(prefix, root->sliceHash->buf, root->sliceHash->length);
00540     
00541     if (res < 0) {
00542         ccn_charbuf_destroy(&prefix);
00543     }
00544     return prefix;
00545 }

00547 
00548 /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00549 // Routines for dealing with hashes.
00550 /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00551 
00552 extern void
00553 SyncGetHashPtr(const struct ccn_buf_decoder *hd,
00554                const unsigned char ** xp, ssize_t *xs) {
00555     struct ccn_buf_decoder xds = *hd;
00556     struct ccn_buf_decoder *xd = &xds;
00557     size_t us = 0;
00558     if (ccn_buf_match_dtag(xd, CCN_DTAG_SyncContentHash)) {
00559         ccn_buf_advance(xd);
00560         if (ccn_buf_match_blob(xd, xp, &us)) ccn_buf_advance(xd);
00561         ccn_buf_check_close(xd);
00562     } else if (ccn_buf_match_dtag(xd, CCN_DTAG_Component)) {
00563         ccn_buf_advance(xd);
00564         if (ccn_buf_match_blob(xd, xp, &us)) ccn_buf_advance(xd);
00565         ccn_buf_check_close(xd);
00566     } else if (ccn_buf_match_dtag(xd, CCN_DTAG_Name)) {
00567         ccn_buf_advance(xd);
00568         for (;;) {
00569             if (!ccn_buf_match_dtag(xd, CCN_DTAG_Component)) break;
00570             ccn_buf_advance(xd);
00571             if (ccn_buf_match_blob(xd, xp, &us)) ccn_buf_advance(xd);
00572             ccn_buf_check_close(xd);
00573         }
00574         ccn_buf_check_close(xd);
00575     }
00576     xs[0] = (ssize_t) us;
00577     if (SyncCheckDecodeErr(xd)) {
00578         // close bug
00579         xp[0] = NULL;
00580         xs[0] = 0;
00581         SyncSetDecodeErr(xd, -__LINE__);
00582     }
00583 }
00584 
00585 extern int
00586 SyncCmpHashesRaw(const unsigned char * xp, ssize_t xs,
00587                  const unsigned char * yp, ssize_t ys) {
00588     if (xs < ys) return -1;
00589     if (xs > ys) return 1;
00590     return memcmp(xp, yp, xs);
00591 }
00592 
00593 extern int
00594 SyncCompareHash(struct ccn_charbuf *hashX, struct ccn_charbuf *hashY) {
00595     if (hashX == hashY) return 0;
00596     if (hashX == NULL) return -1;
00597     if (hashY == NULL) return 1;
00598     size_t lenX = hashX->length;
00599     size_t lenY = hashY->length;
00600     if (lenX < lenY) return -1;
00601     if (lenX > lenY) return 1;
00602     return memcmp(hashX->buf, hashY->buf, lenX);
00603 }
00604 
00605 // accumulates a simple hash code into the hash accumulator
00606 // hash code is raw bytes
00607 extern void
00608 SyncAccumHashRaw(struct SyncLongHashStruct *hp,
00609                  const unsigned char * xp, size_t xs) {
00610     unsigned char *ap = hp->bytes;
00611     int as = MAX_HASH_BYTES;
00612     int aLim = hp->pos;
00613     int c = 0;
00614     if (xs < 2)
00615         SyncNoteErr("SyncAccumHashRaw, xs < 2");
00616     // first, accum from x until no more bytes
00617     while (xs > 0 && as > 0) {
00618         int val = c;
00619         xs--;
00620         as--;
00621         val = val + ap[as] + xp[xs];
00622         c = (val >> 8) & 255;
00623         ap[as] = val & 255;
00624     }
00625     // second, propagate the carry (if any)
00626     while (c > 0 && as > 0) {
00627         as--;
00628         c = c + ap[as];
00629         ap[as] = c & 255;
00630         c = (c >> 8) & 255;
00631     }
00632     // last, update the position (if less than the original)
00633     if (as < aLim) hp->pos = as;
00634 }
00635 
00636 // accumulates a simple hash code referenced by a decoder
00637 // into the hash accumulator for the composite node
00638 // non-destructive of decoder
00639 extern void
00640 SyncAccumHashInner(struct SyncLongHashStruct *hp,
00641                    const struct ccn_buf_decoder *d) {
00642     const unsigned char * xp = NULL;
00643     ssize_t xs = -1;
00644     SyncGetHashPtr(d, &xp, &xs);
00645     if (xs >= 0 && xp != NULL)
00646         SyncAccumHashRaw(hp, xp, xs);
00647 }
00648 
00649 // accumulates a simple hash code referenced by a decoder
00650 // into the hash accumulator for the composite node
00651 // non-destructive of decoder
00652 extern void
00653 SyncAccumHash(struct SyncLongHashStruct *hp, const struct ccn_charbuf *cb) {
00654     struct ccn_buf_decoder ds;
00655     struct ccn_buf_decoder *d = SyncInitDecoderFromCharbuf(&ds, cb, 0);
00656     SyncAccumHashInner(hp, d);
00657 }
00658 
00659 extern struct ccn_charbuf *
00660 SyncLongHashToBuf(const struct SyncLongHashStruct *hp) {
00661     struct ccn_charbuf *ret = ccn_charbuf_create();
00662     int pos = hp->pos;
00663     ccn_charbuf_append(ret, hp->bytes+pos, MAX_HASH_BYTES-pos);
00664     return ret;
00665 }
00666 
00667 // makes a small, unsigned hash code from a full hash
00668 // useful to speed up hash table lookups
00669 extern uint32_t
00670 SyncSmallHash(const unsigned char * xp, ssize_t xs) {
00671     uint32_t ret = 0;
00672     if (xs > 0 && xp != NULL) {
00673         int i = 0;
00674         while (i < xs && i < ((int) sizeof(ret))) {
00675             ret = (ret << 8) + (xp[i] & 255);
00676             i++;
00677         }
00678     }
00679     return ret;
00680 }
00681 
00682 struct SyncHashInfoList *
00683 SyncNoteHash(struct SyncHashInfoList *head, struct SyncHashCacheEntry *ce) {
00684     struct SyncHashInfoList *each = head;
00685     struct SyncHashInfoList *lag = NULL;
00686     while (each != NULL) {
00687         struct SyncHashInfoList *next = each->next;
00688         if (each->ce == ce) {
00689             // found it, so remove it for now
00690             if (lag == NULL) head = next;
00691             else lag->next = next;
00692             break;
00693         }
00694         lag = each;
00695         each = next;
00696     }
00697     if (each == NULL) {
00698         each = NEW_STRUCT(1, SyncHashInfoList);
00699         each->ce = ce;
00700     }
00701     each->lastSeen = SyncCurrentTime();
00702     each->lastReplied = 0;
00703     each->next = head;
00704     return each;
00705 }
00706 
00707 extern struct SyncNameAccum *
00708 SyncExclusionsFromHashList(struct SyncRootStruct *root,
00709                            struct SyncNameAccum *acc,
00710                            struct SyncHashInfoList *list) {
00711     int count = 0;
00712     int limit = 1000;                   // exclusionLimit, in bytes
00713     int64_t now = SyncCurrentTime();
00714     int64_t limitMicros = 1000000 * 10; // exclusionTrig
00715     if (acc == NULL)
00716         acc = SyncAllocNameAccum(0);
00717     
00718     if (root->currentHash->length > 0) {
00719         // if the current hash is not empty, start there
00720         struct ccn_charbuf *hash = root->currentHash;
00721         struct ccn_charbuf *name = ccn_charbuf_create();
00722         count = count + hash->length + 8;
00723         ccn_name_init(name);
00724         ccn_name_append(name, hash->buf, hash->length);
00725         SyncNameAccumAppend(acc, name, 0);
00726     }
00727     
00728     while (list != NULL) {
00729         struct SyncHashCacheEntry *ce = list->ce;
00730         if (ce != NULL && (ce->state & SyncHashState_remote)
00731             && (ce->state & SyncHashState_covered)
00732             && SyncDeltaTime(ce->lastUsed, now) < limitMicros) {
00733             // any remote root known to be covered is excluded
00734             struct ccn_charbuf *hash = ce->hash;
00735             count = count + hash->length + 8;
00736             if (count > limit)
00737                 // exclusion list is getting too long, so ignore earlier roots
00738                 break;
00739             struct ccn_charbuf *name = ccn_charbuf_create();
00740             ccn_name_init(name);
00741             ccn_name_append(name, hash->buf, hash->length);
00742             SyncNameAccumAppend(acc, name, 0);
00743         }
00744         list = list->next;
00745     }
00746     if (acc->len == 0) {
00747         SyncFreeNameAccum(acc);
00748         return NULL;
00749     }
00750     struct SyncNameAccum *lag = acc;
00751     if (acc->len == 0) {
00752         // empty list convention is NULL
00753         acc = NULL;
00754     } else {
00755         // exclusion list must be sorted
00756         acc = SyncSortNames(root, acc);
00757     }
00758     SyncFreeNameAccum(lag);
00759     return acc;
00760 }
00761 
00762 
00763 /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00764 // Routines for appending numbers, hashes and names to a charbuf.
00765 /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00766 
00767 extern int
00768 SyncAppendTaggedNumber(struct ccn_charbuf *cb,
00769                        enum ccn_dtag dtag,
00770                        unsigned val) {
00771     int res = ccnb_tagged_putf(cb, dtag, "%u", val);
00772     return res;
00773 }
00774 
00775 // appends a sequence of random bytes
00776 extern int
00777 SyncAppendRandomBytes(struct ccn_charbuf *cb, int n) {
00778     size_t len = cb->length;
00779     ccn_charbuf_reserve(cb, n);
00780     unsigned char *dst = cb->buf + len;
00781     int i = 0;
00782     while (i < n) {
00783         unsigned int r = random();
00784         dst[i] = (unsigned char) (r & 255);
00785         i++;
00786     }
00787     cb->length = len + n;
00788     return 0;
00789 }
00790 
00791 // appends a random hash code as a ContentHash
00792 extern int
00793 SyncAppendRandomHash(struct ccn_charbuf *cb, int n) {
00794     int res = ccn_charbuf_append_tt(cb, CCN_DTAG_SyncContentHash, CCN_DTAG);
00795     res |= ccn_charbuf_append_tt(cb, n, CCN_BLOB);
00796     res |= SyncAppendRandomBytes(cb, n);
00797     res |= ccn_charbuf_append_closer(cb);
00798     return res;
00799 }
00800 
00801 // appends a random name of nComp random-length components plus a random hash
00802 extern int
00803 SyncAppendRandomName(struct ccn_charbuf *cb, int nComp, int maxCompLen) {
00804     struct ccn_charbuf *rb = ccn_charbuf_create();
00805     int res = ccn_charbuf_append_tt(cb, CCN_DTAG_Name, CCN_DTAG);
00806     res |= ccn_charbuf_append_closer(cb);
00807     while (nComp > 0 && res == 0) {
00808         unsigned nb = random();
00809         nb = (nb % (maxCompLen+1));
00810         ccn_charbuf_reset(rb);
00811         SyncAppendRandomBytes(rb, nb);
00812         res |= ccn_name_append(cb, rb->buf, nb);
00813         nComp--;
00814     }
00815     // always have a hash code as the last component
00816     ccn_charbuf_reset(rb);
00817     res |= SyncAppendRandomBytes(rb, DEFAULT_HASH_BYTES);
00818     res |= ccn_name_append(cb, rb->buf, rb->length);
00819     
00820     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&rb);
00821     
00822     return res;
00823 }
00824 
00825 // appendElementInner appends the ccnb encoding from the decoder to the cb output
00826 // types supported: CCN_DTAG_Name, CCN_DTAG_SyncContentHash, CCN_DTAG_BinaryValue
00827 // any error returns < 0
00828 // this routine advances the decoder!
00829 extern int
00830 SyncAppendElementInner(struct ccn_charbuf *cb, struct ccn_buf_decoder *d) {
00831     int res = 0;
00832     int src = 0;
00833     if (ccn_buf_match_dtag(d, CCN_DTAG_Name)) {
00834         ccn_buf_advance(d);
00835         int res = ccn_charbuf_append_tt(cb, CCN_DTAG_Name, CCN_DTAG);
00836         res |= ccn_charbuf_append_closer(cb);
00837         while (ccn_buf_match_dtag(d, CCN_DTAG_Component)) {
00838             const unsigned char *cPtr = NULL;
00839             size_t cSize = 0;
00840             ccn_buf_advance(d);
00841             if (ccn_buf_match_blob(d, &cPtr, &cSize)) ccn_buf_advance(d);
00842             res |= ccn_name_append(cb, cPtr, cSize);
00843             ccn_buf_check_close(d);
00844         }
00845         ccn_buf_check_close(d);
00846     } else if (ccn_buf_match_dtag(d, CCN_DTAG_SyncContentHash)) {
00847         const unsigned char *cPtr = NULL;
00848         size_t cSize = 0;
00849         ccn_buf_advance(d);
00850         if (ccn_buf_match_blob(d, &cPtr, &cSize)) ccn_buf_advance(d);
00851         res |= ccnb_append_tagged_blob(cb, CCN_DTAG_SyncContentHash, cPtr, cSize);
00852     } else if (ccn_buf_match_dtag(d, CCN_DTAG_BinaryValue)) {
00853         const unsigned char *cPtr = NULL;
00854         size_t cSize = 0;
00855         ccn_buf_advance(d);
00856         if (ccn_buf_match_blob(d, &cPtr, &cSize)) ccn_buf_advance(d);
00857         res |= ccnb_append_tagged_blob(cb, CCN_DTAG_BinaryValue, cPtr, cSize);
00858     } else res = -__LINE__;
00859     if (SyncCheckDecodeErr(d)) src = -__LINE__;
00860     if (res == 0) res = src;
00861     return res;
00862 }
00863 
00864 // appendElement appends the ccnb encoding from the src to the dst
00865 // types supported: CCN_DTAG_Name, CCN_DTAG_SyncContentHash, CCN_DTAG_BinaryValue
00866 // any error returns < 0
00867 extern int
00868 SyncAppendElement(struct ccn_charbuf *dst, const struct ccn_charbuf *src) {
00869     struct ccn_buf_decoder ds;
00870     struct ccn_buf_decoder *d = SyncInitDecoderFromCharbuf(&ds, src, 0);
00871     int res = SyncAppendElementInner(dst, d);
00872     return res;
00873 }
00874 
00875 extern struct ccn_charbuf *
00876 SyncExtractName(struct ccn_buf_decoder *d) {
00877     struct ccn_charbuf *name = NULL;
00878     if (ccn_buf_match_dtag(d, CCN_DTAG_Name)) {
00879         name = ccn_charbuf_create();
00880         int res = SyncAppendElementInner(name, d);
00881         if (res < 0) {
00882             // parse error, so get rid of the buffer
00883             ccn_charbuf_destroy(&name);
00884             SyncSetDecodeErr(d, -__LINE__);
00885         }
00886     } else
00887         SyncSetDecodeErr(d, -__LINE__);
00888     return name;
00889 }
00890 
00891 extern struct ccn_charbuf *
00892 SyncCopyName(const struct ccn_charbuf *name) {
00893     struct ccn_charbuf *ret = ccn_charbuf_create();
00894     ccn_charbuf_append_charbuf(ret, name);
00895     return ret;
00896 }
00897 
00898 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00899 // Routines for simple parsing
00900 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00901 
00902 extern unsigned
00903 SyncParseUnsigned(struct ccn_buf_decoder *d, enum ccn_dtag dtag) {
00904     uintmax_t val = 0;
00905     if (ccn_buf_match_dtag(d, dtag)) {
00906         ccn_buf_advance(d);
00907         if (ccn_parse_uintmax(d, &val) >= 0) {
00908             ccn_buf_check_close(d);
00909             if (SyncCheckDecodeErr(d) == 0)
00910                 return val;
00911         }
00912     }
00913     SET_ERR(d);
00914     return val;
00915 }
00916 
00917 extern ssize_t
00918 SyncParseHash(struct ccn_buf_decoder *d) {
00919     ssize_t off = d->decoder.token_index;
00920     ccn_parse_required_tagged_BLOB(d, CCN_DTAG_SyncContentHash, 0, MAX_HASH_BYTES);
00921     return off;
00922 }
00923 
00924 extern ssize_t
00925 SyncParseName(struct ccn_buf_decoder *d) {
00926     ssize_t off = d->decoder.token_index;
00927     if (ccn_buf_match_dtag(d, CCN_DTAG_Name)) {
00928         ccn_buf_advance(d);
00929         while (ccn_buf_match_dtag(d, CCN_DTAG_Component)) {
00930             ccn_buf_advance(d);
00931             if (ccn_buf_match_blob(d, NULL, NULL)) ccn_buf_advance(d);
00932             ccn_buf_check_close(d);
00933         }
00934         ccn_buf_check_close(d);
00935     } else SET_ERR(d);
00936     return off;
00937 }
00938 
00939 ////////////////////////////////////////
00940 // Name and Node Accumulators
00941 ////////////////////////////////////////
00942 
00943 extern struct SyncNameAccum *
00944 SyncAllocNameAccum(int lim) {
00945     struct SyncNameAccum *na = NEW_STRUCT(1, SyncNameAccum);
00946     if (lim < 4) lim = 4;
00947     na->lim = lim;
00948     na->ents = NEW_STRUCT(lim, SyncNameAccumEntry);
00949     return na;
00950 }
00951 
00952 extern struct SyncNameAccum *
00953 SyncFreeNameAccum(struct SyncNameAccum *na) {
00954     if (na != NULL) {
00955         if (na->ents != NULL) free(na->ents);
00956         free(na);
00957     }
00958     return NULL;
00959 }
00960 
00961 extern struct SyncNameAccum *
00962 SyncFreeNameAccumAndNames(struct SyncNameAccum *na) {
00963     if (na != NULL) {
00964         if (na->ents != NULL) {
00965             int i = 0;
00966             for (i = 0; i < na->len; i++) {
00967                 struct ccn_charbuf *name = na->ents[i].name;
00968                 if (name != NULL) {
00969                     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&name);
00970                     na->ents[i].name = NULL;
00971                 }
00972             }
00973             free(na->ents);
00974             na->ents = NULL;
00975         }
00976         free(na);
00977     }
00978     return NULL;
00979 }
00980 
00981 extern int
00982 SyncNameAccumSorter(IndexSorter_Base base,
00983                     IndexSorter_Index x, IndexSorter_Index y) {
00984     struct SyncNameAccum *na = (struct SyncNameAccum *) base->client;
00985     IndexSorter_Index len = na->len;
00986     if (x < len && y < len) {
00987         struct ccn_charbuf *cbx = na->ents[x].name;
00988         struct ccn_charbuf *cby = na->ents[y].name;
00989         int cmp = SyncCmpNames(cbx, cby);
00990         if (cmp != SYNC_BAD_CMP) return cmp;
00991     }
00992     SyncNoteErr("nameAccumSorter");
00993     return 0;
00994 }
00995 
00996 extern int
00997 SyncNameAccumAppend(struct SyncNameAccum *na,
00998                     struct ccn_charbuf *name,
00999                     intmax_t data) {
01000     if (name == NULL || name->length == 0)
01001         SyncNoteErr("SyncNameAccumAppend");
01002 
01003     struct SyncNameAccumEntry *ents = na->ents;
01004     int len = na->len;
01005     if (len == na->lim) {
01006         // expand the storage
01007         int newLim = na->lim + na->lim/2 + 4;
01008         struct SyncNameAccumEntry *newEnts = NEW_STRUCT(newLim, SyncNameAccumEntry);
01009         memcpy(newEnts, ents, len*sizeof(struct SyncNameAccumEntry));
01010         free(ents);
01011         na->lim = newLim;
01012         ents = newEnts;
01013         na->ents = newEnts;
01014     }
01015     ents[len].name = name;
01016     ents[len].data = data;
01017     na->len = len + 1;
01018     return 1;
01019 }
01020 
01021 extern struct ccn_charbuf *
01022 SyncNameAccumCanon(struct SyncNameAccum *na,
01023                    const struct ccn_charbuf *name) {
01024     struct ccn_charbuf *found = NULL;
01025     int i = 0;
01026     // scan for an existing name
01027     for (i = 0; i < na->len; i++) {
01028         int cmp = SyncCmpNames(name, na->ents[i].name);
01029         if (cmp == 0) {
01030             // existing name found, bump the count
01031             found = na->ents[i].name;
01032             na->ents[i].data++;
01033             break;
01034         }
01035     }
01036     if (found == NULL) {
01037         // make a new one and append it
01038         found = ccn_charbuf_create();
01039         ccn_charbuf_append_charbuf(found, name);
01040         SyncNameAccumAppend(na, found, 1);
01041     }
01042     return found;
01043 }
01044 
01045 extern struct SyncNodeAccum *
01046 SyncAllocNodeAccum(int lim) {
01047     struct SyncNodeAccum *na = NEW_STRUCT(1, SyncNodeAccum);
01048     if (lim < 4) lim = 4;
01049     na->lim = lim;
01050     na->ents = NEW_ANY(lim, struct SyncNodeComposite *);
01051     return na;
01052 }
01053 
01054 extern struct SyncNodeAccum *
01055 SyncFreeNodeAccum(struct SyncNodeAccum *na) {
01056     if (na != NULL) {
01057         if (na->ents != NULL) free(na->ents);
01058         free(na);
01059     }
01060     return NULL;
01061 }
01062 
01063 extern void
01064 SyncAccumNode(struct SyncNodeAccum *na, struct SyncNodeComposite *nc) {
01065     struct SyncNodeComposite **ents = na->ents;
01066     int len = na->len;
01067     if (len == na->lim) {
01068         // expand the storage
01069         int newLim = na->lim + na->lim/2 + 4;
01070         struct SyncNodeComposite **newEnts = NEW_ANY(newLim,
01071                                                      struct SyncNodeComposite *);
01072         memcpy(newEnts, ents, len*sizeof(struct SyncNodeComposite *));
01073         free(ents);
01074         na->lim = newLim;
01075         ents = newEnts;
01076         na->ents = newEnts;
01077     }
01078     ents[len] = nc;
01079     na->len = len + 1;
01080 }
01081 
01082 extern int
01083 SyncAddName(struct SyncBaseStruct *base,
01084             struct ccn_charbuf *name,
01085             uint64_t seq_num) {
01086     static char *here = "Sync.SyncAddName";
01087     struct SyncPrivate *priv = base->priv;
01088     int debug = base->debug;
01089     struct SyncRootStruct *root = priv->rootHead;
01090     int count = 0;
01091     while (root != NULL) {
01092         if (SyncRootLookupName(root, name) == SyncRootLookupCode_covered) {
01093             // ANY matching root gets an addition
01094             // add the name for later processing
01095             struct SyncRootPrivate *rp = root->priv;
01096             struct ccn_charbuf *prev = NULL;
01097             int pos = root->namesToAdd->len;
01098             if (pos > 0) prev = root->namesToAdd->ents[pos-1].name;
01099             if (prev != NULL && SyncCmpNames(name, prev) == 0) {
01100                 // this is a duplicate, so forget it!
01101                 if (debug >= CCNL_FINE) {
01102                     SyncNoteUri(root, here, "ignore dup", name);
01103                 }
01104             } else {
01105                 // not obviously a duplicate
01106                 uint64_t sn = seq_num;
01107                 if (sn == 0) {
01108                     // TBD: is there a better inference method?
01109                     sn = rp->max_seq_num_stable;
01110                     if (rp->max_seq_num_build > sn)
01111                         sn = rp->max_seq_num_build;
01112                 }
01113                 SyncNameAccumAppend(root->namesToAdd, SyncCopyName(name), sn);
01114                 count++;
01115                 if (sn > rp->max_seq_num_seen)
01116                     rp->max_seq_num_seen = sn;
01117                 if (debug >= CCNL_FINE) {
01118                     SyncNoteUri(root, here, "added", name);
01119                 }
01120             }
01121         }
01122         root = root->next;
01123     }
01124     return count;
01125 }
01126 
01127 // take a list of names and sort them, removing duplicates!
01128 // should leave src empty  
01129 extern struct SyncNameAccum *
01130 SyncSortNames(struct SyncRootStruct *root, struct SyncNameAccum *src) {
01131     char *here = "Sync.sortNames";
01132     if (src == NULL) return NULL;
01133     IndexSorter_Index ixLim = src->len;
01134     IndexSorter_Base ixBase = IndexSorter_New(ixLim, -1);
01135     ixBase->sorter = SyncNameAccumSorter;
01136     ixBase->client = src;
01137     IndexSorter_Index ix = 0;
01138     for (ix = 0; ix < ixLim; ix++) IndexSorter_Add(ixBase, ix);
01139     struct SyncNameAccum *dst = SyncAllocNameAccum(ixLim);
01140     struct ccn_charbuf *lag = NULL;
01141     for (ix = 0; ix < ixLim; ix++) {
01142         IndexSorter_Index j = IndexSorter_Rem(ixBase);
01143         if (j >= ixLim) {
01144             SyncNoteFailed(root, here, "rem failed", __LINE__);
01145             break;
01146         }
01147         struct ccn_charbuf *name = src->ents[j].name;
01148         src->ents[j].name = NULL;
01149         if (name == NULL) {
01150             SyncNoteFailed(root, here, "name == NULL", __LINE__);
01151             break;
01152         }
01153         if (lag == NULL || SyncCmpNames(lag, name) != 0) {
01154             // only append the name if it is not a duplicate
01155             SyncNameAccumAppend(dst, name, src->ents[j].data);
01156             lag = name;
01157         } else {
01158             // this name needs to be destroyed
01159             ccn_charbuf_destroy(&name);
01160         }
01161     }    
01162     src->len = 0;
01163     IndexSorter_Free(&ixBase);
01164     return dst;
01165 }
01166 
01167 
01168 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////
01169 // Routines for simple interest creation
01170 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////
01171 
01172 static int
01173 appendLifetime(struct ccn_charbuf *cb, int lifetime) {
01174     unsigned char buf[sizeof(int32_t)];
01175     int32_t dreck = lifetime << 12;
01176     int pos = sizeof(int32_t);
01177     int res = 0;
01178     while (dreck > 0 && pos > 0) {
01179         pos--;
01180         buf[pos] = dreck & 255;
01181         dreck = dreck >> 8;
01182     }
01183     res |= ccnb_append_tagged_blob(cb, CCN_DTAG_InterestLifetime,
01184                                    buf+pos, sizeof(buf)-pos);
01185     return res;
01186 }
01187 
01188 static int
01189 appendExclusions(struct ccn_charbuf *cb, struct SyncNameAccum *excl) {
01190     if (excl != NULL) {
01191         int i = 0;
01192         ccn_charbuf_append_tt(cb, CCN_DTAG_Exclude, CCN_DTAG);
01193         for (i = 0; i < excl->len; i++) {
01194             struct ccn_charbuf *name = excl->ents[i].name;
01195             // append just the first component
01196             struct ccn_buf_decoder ds;
01197             struct ccn_buf_decoder *d = SyncInitDecoderFromCharbuf(&ds, name, 0);
01198             size_t cSize = 0;
01199             if (ccn_buf_match_dtag(d, CCN_DTAG_Name)) {
01200                 ccn_buf_advance(d);
01201                 if (ccn_buf_match_dtag(d, CCN_DTAG_Component)) {
01202                     ccn_buf_advance(d);
01203                     const unsigned char *cPtr = NULL;
01204                     if (ccn_buf_match_blob(d, &cPtr, &cSize)) {
01205                         ccn_buf_advance(d);
01206                         ccnb_append_tagged_blob(cb, CCN_DTAG_Component, cPtr, cSize);
01207                     }
01208                 }
01209             }
01210             if (cSize == 0) return -__LINE__;
01211         }
01212         ccn_charbuf_append_closer(cb); /* </Exclude> */
01213         return 1;
01214     }
01215     return 0;
01216 }
01217 
01218 extern struct ccn_charbuf *
01219 SyncGenInterest(struct ccn_charbuf *name,
01220                 int scope, int lifetime, int maxSuffix, int childPref,
01221                 struct SyncNameAccum *excl) {
01222     struct ccn_charbuf *cb = ccn_charbuf_create();
01223     ccn_charbuf_append_tt(cb, CCN_DTAG_Interest, CCN_DTAG);
01224     int res = 0;
01225     if (name == NULL) {
01226         res |= ccn_charbuf_append_tt(cb, CCN_DTAG_Name, CCN_DTAG);
01227         res |= ccn_charbuf_append_closer(cb); /* </Name> */
01228     } else {
01229         ccn_charbuf_append_charbuf(cb, name);
01230     }
01231     if (maxSuffix >= 0)
01232         ccnb_tagged_putf(cb, CCN_DTAG_MaxSuffixComponents, "%d", maxSuffix);
01233     res |= appendExclusions(cb, excl);
01234     if (childPref >= 0)
01235         // low bit determines least/most preference
01236         ccnb_tagged_putf(cb, CCN_DTAG_ChildSelector, "%d", childPref);
01237     if (scope >= 0)
01238         ccnb_tagged_putf(cb, CCN_DTAG_Scope, "%d", scope);
01239     if (lifetime > 0)
01240         appendLifetime(cb, lifetime);
01241     ccn_charbuf_append_closer(cb); /* </Interest> */
01242     if (res < 0) {
01243         ccn_charbuf_destroy(&cb);
01244     }
01245     return cb;
01246 }
01247 
01248 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////
01249 // Routines for local repo read/write
01250 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////
01251 
01252 #define UseLocalTopoPrefix 1
01253 extern struct ccn_charbuf *
01254 SyncNameForLocalNode(struct SyncRootStruct *root, struct ccn_charbuf *hash) {
01255     // form the name of the node
01256     // use the NodeFetch convention, but at the local host
01257     struct ccn_charbuf *sh = root->sliceHash;
01258     struct ccn_charbuf *nm = ccn_charbuf_create();
01259     int res = 0;
01260 #ifdef UseLocalTopoPrefix
01261     // new method used root->topoPrefix
01262     res |= ccn_charbuf_append_charbuf(nm, root->topoPrefix);
01263 #else    
01264     // old method used localhost instead of topoPrefix
01265      res |= ccn_name_init(nm);
01266      res |= ccn_name_append_str(nm, "\xC1.M.S.localhost");
01267 #endif
01268     res |= ccn_name_append_str(nm, "\xC1.S.nf");
01269     res |= ccn_name_append(nm, sh->buf, sh->length);
01270     res |= ccn_name_append(nm, hash->buf, hash->length);
01271     if (res < 0) ccn_charbuf_destroy(&nm);
01272     return nm;
01273 }
01274 
01275 extern int
01276 SyncPointerToContent(struct ccn_charbuf *cb, struct ccn_parsed_ContentObject *pco,
01277                      const unsigned char **xp, size_t *xs) {
01278     struct ccn_parsed_ContentObject pcos;
01279     int res = 0;
01280     if (pco == NULL) {
01281         // not already parsed, so do it now
01282         pco = &pcos;
01283         res = ccn_parse_ContentObject(cb->buf, cb->length,
01284                                       pco, NULL);
01285     }
01286     if (res >= 0)
01287         // worth trying to extract the content
01288         res = ccn_content_get_value(cb->buf, cb->length, pco, xp, xs);
01289     return res;
01290 }
01291 
01292 extern struct ccn_charbuf *
01293 SyncSignBuf(struct SyncBaseStruct *base,
01294             struct ccn_charbuf *cb,
01295             struct ccn_charbuf *name,
01296             long fresh, int flags) {
01297     struct ccn_charbuf *cob = ccn_charbuf_create();
01298     struct ccn_signing_params sp = CCN_SIGNING_PARAMS_INIT;
01299     
01300     if (cb != NULL) {
01301         // signing content, will put as data
01302         sp.type = CCN_CONTENT_DATA;
01303     } else {
01304         // cb == NULL requests deletion
01305         cb = ccn_charbuf_create();
01306         sp.type = CCN_CONTENT_GONE;
01307     }
01308     sp.sp_flags |= flags;
01309     
01310     if (fresh > 0 && fresh <= freshLimit) {
01311         sp.template_ccnb = ccn_charbuf_create();
01312         ccn_charbuf_append_tt(sp.template_ccnb, CCN_DTAG_SignedInfo, CCN_DTAG);
01313         ccnb_tagged_putf(sp.template_ccnb, CCN_DTAG_FreshnessSeconds, "%ld", fresh);
01314         sp.sp_flags |= CCN_SP_TEMPL_FRESHNESS;
01315         ccn_charbuf_append_closer(sp.template_ccnb);
01316     }
01317     
01318     int res = ccn_sign_content(base->sd->ccn,
01319                                cob,
01320                                name,
01321                                &sp,
01322                                cb->buf,
01323                                cb->length);
01324     
01325     if (sp.template_ccnb != NULL) 
01326         ccn_charbuf_destroy(&sp.template_ccnb);
01327     if (sp.type == CCN_CONTENT_GONE)
01328         ccn_charbuf_destroy(&cb);
01329     if (res < 0) {
01330         // it did not work, so return the output buffer
01331         ccn_charbuf_destroy(&cob);
01332         return NULL;
01333     }
01334     return cob;
01335 }
01336 
01337 extern int
01338 SyncLocalRepoStore(struct SyncBaseStruct *base,
01339                    struct ccn_charbuf *name,
01340                    struct ccn_charbuf *content,
01341                    int flags) {
01342     char *here = "Sync.SyncLocalRepoStore";
01343     int res = -__LINE__;
01344     struct sync_plumbing *sd = base->sd;
01345     if (sd->client_methods->r_sync_local_store == NULL)
01346         return -__LINE__;
01347     struct ccn_charbuf *cob = SyncSignBuf(base, content, name, -1, flags);
01348     char *why = NULL;
01349     if (cob == NULL) {
01350         why = "signing failed";
01351         res = -__LINE__;
01352     } else {
01353         res = sd->client_methods->r_sync_local_store(sd, cob);
01354         if (res < 0) {
01355             why = "store failed";
01356             res = -__LINE__;
01357         }
01358         ccn_charbuf_destroy(&cob);
01359     }
01360     if (why != NULL)
01361         if (base->debug >= CCNL_ERROR)
01362             SyncNoteUriBase(base, here, why, name);
01363     return res;
01364 }
01365 
01366 extern int
01367 SyncLocalRepoFetch(struct SyncBaseStruct *base,
01368                    struct ccn_charbuf *name,
01369                    struct ccn_charbuf *cb,
01370                    struct ccn_parsed_ContentObject *pco) {
01371     char *here = "Sync.SyncLocalRepoFetch";
01372     struct ccn_charbuf *interest = SyncGenInterest(name, 1, 1, -1, 1, NULL);
01373     struct ccn_parsed_ContentObject pcos;
01374     if (pco == NULL) pco = &pcos;
01375     struct sync_plumbing *sd = base->sd;
01376     if (sd->client_methods->r_sync_lookup == NULL)
01377         return -__LINE__;
01378     if (interest == NULL) return -__LINE__;
01379     int res = sd->client_methods->r_sync_lookup(sd, interest, cb);
01380     char *why = NULL;
01381     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&interest);
01382     if (res < 0) {
01383         why = "fetch failed";
01384         res = -__LINE__;
01385     } else {
01386         res = ccn_parse_ContentObject(cb->buf, cb->length, pco, NULL);
01387         if (res < 0) why = "parse failed";
01388         else {
01389             res = ccn_verify_content(base->sd->ccn, cb->buf, pco);
01390             if (res < 0) why = "verify failed";
01391         }
01392     }
01393     if (why != NULL)
01394         if (base->debug >= CCNL_ERROR)
01395             SyncNoteUriBase(base, here, why, name);
01396     return res;
01397 }
